edu.umd.cs.psl.optimizer.conic.ipm.solver

Class BlockSolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.optimizer.conic.ipm.solver.BlockSolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NormalSystemSolver

    public class BlockSolver
extends java.lang.Object
implements NormalSystemSolver
    Solves normal systems using the Schur's complement method, where the complement is complementary to a block-diagonal submatrix found by partitioning.

      • CG_MAX_ITER_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_MAX_ITER_KEY
        Key for integer property. The BlockSolver will throw an exception if the conjugate gradient solver completes this many iterations without solving the normal system.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CG_REL_TOL_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_REL_TOL_KEY
        Key for double property. The conjugate gradient solver will terminate as converged if the residual is less than this value times the initial residual.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CG_DIV_TOL_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String CG_DIV_TOL_KEY
        Key for double property. The BlockSolver will throw an exception if the conjugate graident solver reaches an iterate whose residual is at least this value times the initial residual.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CG_DIV_TOL_DEFAULT

        public static final double CG_DIV_TOL_DEFAULT
        Default value for CG_DIV_TOL_KEY property
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRECONDITIONER_TERMS_KEY

        public static final java.lang.String PRECONDITIONER_TERMS_KEY
        Key for non-negative integer property. The BlockSolver preconditions the Schur's complement matrix by a truncated series summation. Higher values generally result in fewer conjugate gradient iterations, but each iteration is more time consuming.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRECONDITIONER_TERMS_DEFAULT

        public static final int PRECONDITIONER_TERMS_DEFAULT
        Default value for PRECONDITIONER_TERMS_KEY property
